thread.title: Jesse

author: Jesse
title: Jesse
text: I've ordered many things from groupon and its always been great. Unfortunately just had a mug show up that was broke into 30 pieces. Site has a easy return and refund policy, which is great but I wanted the mug and the site no longer has it available. I think you should rethink that portion of the policy and make sure the customer gets the product they ordered. Please consider. Thanks.
